arts.ttl: Isaac Olaofe scores only goal of the game as Stockport beat Bolton
arts.sum: Wanderers rallied late on but Josh Sheehan and top scorer Aaron Collins were denied by Corey Addai.

arts.ttl: Bolton Wanderers youngster given dream call-up for Egypt Under-20s squad
arts.sum: Bolton Wanderers prospect Sonny Sharples-Ahmed has been called up by Egypt's Under-20s as they prepare for the African Cup of Nations.

arts.ttl: Josh Dacres-Cogley confirms new one-year contract with Bolton Wanderers
arts.sum: Josh Dacres-Cogley has revealed that he signed a one-year contract extension with Bolton Wanderers earlier this season.
